main.name: Billy Pesoth
main.description:
I develop smooth, clean-coded web and mobile apps, and engaging games. 
Scroll down to explore my work
main.bio: Full stack by trade, game dev by passion. I work with React, Vue, and Node for the web, while Unity and C# power the worlds I create in games. Obsessed with clean code, smooth UX, and turning wild ideas into something you can actually play or click.
main.bioFormal: Fullstack and Game Developer skilled in JavaScript and C#, with expertise in React, Node.js, and Unity Engine. I develop scalable apps and immersive games, learning quickly and building with clean, maintainable code to create impactful solutions.
main.bioCreative: Powered by coffee and curiosity, I turn ideas into code and code into adventures. By day, I craft smooth, responsive web apps with React and Node.js. By night, I roam Unity with C#, creating vibrant game worlds where anything’s possible. From clicks to taps to epic in-game leaps — I make every interaction a joy.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here’s an overview of the core skills I bring to every project.

education.description: I gained skills in programming, databases, system analysis, and teamwork through various projects.
Graduated from Hacktiv8’s intensive Fullstack Developer bootcamp, where I built real-world projects while mastering modern web technologies — from JavaScript to Sequelize, MongoDB, React, and Vue.

work.title: Unity Developer
work.description: Developing mobile and desktop games using Unity. Responsible for game mechanics implementation, optimization, and feature updates while collaborating with designers and artists.

work.title: Unity Developer
work.description: Worked on Unity-based projects for mobile platforms, integrating assets and scripting core gameplay features in collaboration with an international team.

work.title: Unity Developer Intern
work.description: Created scripts and integrated 3D models, animations, and GUI elements for desktop, mobile, VR, and AR projects. Gained hands-on experience in AI development with Unity 3D.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Built and maintained web and mobile solutions. Developed admin front-end using React JS and implemented mobile UI with Ionic.

work.title: Software Developer
work.description: Configured LAMP server environments, modified and enhanced existing software, and created plugins and themes for Moodle-based learning systems.
